columns.Receipt: The unique identifier for each transaction in the bakery.
columns.Ordinal: The position of the item in the transaction list.
columns.Item: The identifier for the specific product sold.

items.table_description: The table records item transactions in the bakery.

columns.Id: The unique identifier for each food item in the bakery.
columns.Flavor: The specific taste variant of the food item offered.
columns.Food: The type or category of the food item sold.
columns.Price: The cost of the food item in the bakery.

goods.table_description: The table lists food items available for sale in the bakery.

columns.Id: The unique identifier for each customer in the bakery.
columns.LastName: The surname of the customer for identification.
columns.FirstName: The given name of the customer for personal reference.

customers.table_description: The table holds customer information for the bakery.

columns.ReceiptNumber: The unique identifier for each receipt issued by the bakery.
columns.Date: The date when the transaction occurred at the bakery.
columns.CustomerId: The unique identifier for the customer associated with the receipt.

receipts.table_description: The table records transaction details for customer purchases in the bakery.
